DOC.brief_summary: Obesity , increase abdominal fat , fat store liver , insulin resistance may associate adverse maternal fetal pregnancy outcomes . This study examine fat storage change pregnancy ; body store fat impact one 's ability metabolize glucose ( sugar ) pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Role Liver Visceral Fat Glucose Lipid Metabolism During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim serially evaluate liver visceral fat store pregnancy relationship glucose lipid metabolism , placental function , newborn size . To conduct prospective cohort study pregnant woman without pre-gestational early gestational diabetes assess 12-16 week gestation 32-36 week gestation case-control study woman normal impaired glucose tolerance early third trimester . Physical assessment perform Oregon Health Science University bio-nutrition unit include use magnetic resonance imaging , ultrasound , blood draw .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant enrol member Kaiser Women multiples pregnancy ; history : cardiovascular disease , bariatric surgery , anemia , chronic hypertension renal disease . NonEnglish speaker
